thread.title: GE Awarded DOE Project to Pilot CO2 Capture Technology for Power Plants

title: GE Awarded DOE Project to Pilot CO2 Capture Technology for Power Plants
text:
GE Awarded DOE Project to Pilot CO2 Capture Technology for Power Plants Sep 17, 2015 
OKLAHOMA CITY, Sep 17, 2015 (BUSINESS WIRE) -- --CO2 Capture Technology to be piloted at world's largest carbon test center in Mongstad, Norway Calling it CO2 "Capture Technology in a Bottle," a team of researchers at GE's Oil & Gas Technology Center in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma have been awarded close to $1 million in Phase I funding by the U.S. Department of … ( continue reading ) Energy Press Releases L-3 MAPPS to Deliver Severe Accident Simulator to Westinghouse for Project in Japan Sep 17, 2015 Get Breaking Energy Technology News by Email.
